wikipedia_page.main: Jackie Hutton (23 April 1944 – 20 May 2015) was a Scottish football player and manager. He played for Wishaw Juniors early in his football career and then most notably for Scunthorpe United.

response: Jackson left in 1986 and new manager Jackie Hutton had no money with which to buy players but he did the club a great service when he somehow completed the deal which brought Roy Walker, initially as a player, to Seaview in 1988.
